title: Cubic Feet to Gallons Converter (ft³ ⇄ gal US, UK, dry)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 ft³ = 7.480519 US gal (liquid) 1 ft³ = 6.228835 UK gal 1 ft³ = 6.427010 US dry gal 1 ft³ = 28.3168466 L General formula: gallons = ft³ × factor and ft³ = gallons ÷ factor
